# llms.txt â€” SilentCut

# Product overview
SilentCut is a deterministic audio processing tool that removes long and
unnatural pauses from AI-generated voices and recorded speech.
It does not use artificial intelligence.

## Primary page
https://silentcut.studio/

# Description
The homepage explains the problem of unnatural pauses in narration
and how SilentCut fixes them using precise timeline compression.
